metadata.Name: RusCode
metadata.Description: RusCode is a benchmark for evaluating the ability of text-to-image models to understand and generate images based on Russian cultural concepts. It consists of 100 prompts describing Russian cultural phenomena, paired with high-quality images generated by human artists.
metadata.Paper Title: RusCode: Russian Cultural Code Benchmark for Text-to-Image Generation
metadata.Abstract: We introduce RusCode, a new benchmark for evaluating the cultural awareness of text-to-image models. The benchmark consists of 100 prompts describing Russian cultural phenomena, paired with high-quality images generated by human artists. We evaluate several state-of-the-art text-to-image models on RusCode and show that they struggle to generate images that accurately reflect Russian culture. We hope that RusCode will serve as a valuable resource for researchers working on text-to-image generation and cultural understanding.
